posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb Red Background SGC 80 Endicott NY Find
posts.post_content:
I'm interested in acquiring the Cobb Red Background SGC 80 from the Endicott NY Find from a few years back.

Checking to see if the owner may be a Net 54 member and possibly interested in parting with it.

If so, please send PM or e-mail at [url]alstonjb@aol.com[/url].

Thanks
